articles.author: Josh Dinner
articles.title: Watch Europe's Vega-C rocket launch today on 1st flight since 2022 (video) - Space.com
articles.description: The rocket's last launch ended in a catastrophic failure.
articles.content:
For the first time since the launch vehicle's catastrophic mission failure in 2022, Europe's Vega-C rocket is poised to return to flight today.
The European Space Agency (ESA) is scheduled to launch… [+5170 chars]
